results.title: title text
results.policy_welcome:
oh hi! i'm so glad you've come by my shop! thank you so much for swinging in and taking a peek around :D

well, here are the 'ol policy-os. please do read carefully:
results.policy_payment:
payment method accepted: 
paypal (hooray!)

terms: 
submit payment promptly. payment is due 3 days after purchase of the item. 

upon receipt of payment, the order will be shipped within 1 week.
results.policy_shipping:
method: usps first-class mail.
 
please feel free to contact me for rates on expedited shipping. 

i am not responsible for taxes or duties for your country.
results.policy_refunds:
oh help!
if you are not happy with your item, please let me know. we can work this out! i will try my best to replace the item or refund your money, as the goal of my shop is to create and share in crafty happiness. right on!
results.policy_additional:
ok. well, that's about it! mostly, just be good, nice, honest, and fair, and this will return to you tenfold.

if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask me.

thanks a bunch, you! cheers!
